Messages.AuthLevelChanged: You changed the required Auth Level to %d!
Help: /adu.authlevel <n/s> - Change the required auth level to open locked doors.
Messages.InvalidAuthLevel: You need pass a valid auth level like: admin, owner, mod, moderator, user, player, 0 or 1 or 2!
Messages.NotAllowed: You cannot use that command because you don't have the required Auth Level %d!
